title: Kane Epati
text: Kane Epati (born 13 August 1981 in <a href="Samoa">Samoa</a>) is a professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer. Originally a rugby union player in his native Samoa, he now plays Rugby league for <a href="Dewsbury%20Rams">Dewsbury Rams</a> in <a href="RFL%20League%201">Championship 1</a> in England following stints at <a href="Doncaster%20R.L.F.C.">Doncaster Lakers</a>, <a href="Hull%20Kingston%20Rovers">Hull Kingston Rovers</a>, where he was part of the Northern Rail Cup–winning squad in 2005 and French rugby union side Castres. He started out as a , but he has now moved into the s and can also play . He has played for the <a href="Cook%20Islands">Cook Islands</a> national rugby league team and also on the international rugby union 7's circuit.
